title: start1
description:
This is some rickety old shack, water drips from a hole in the roof,
 there is a table, a bed and a door.

title: field1-1
description: You walk into the middle of a field surrounded by tall grass. You see trees to the north and a forest to the east.

title: field1-2
description: There is a small broken well with a bucket hanging in it.

title: field1-3
description: The mountains loom to the north and west you will not be able to pass these mountains.

title: forest1-1
description: The edge of a dense evergreen forest that gives you an eerie feeling as you look deep in.

title: forest1-2
description: Skirting the edge of the forest you see mountains north of the field.

title: forest1-3
description: Skirting the edge of the forest you see mountains north of the field.

title: forest2-1
description: You can see the edge of the forest in the distance, but feel uneasy that you may lose your way.

title: forest2-2
description: You can see the edge of the forest in the distance, but feel uneasy that you may lose your way.

title: forest2-3
description: You can see the edge of the forest in the distance, but feel uneasy that you may lose your way.

title: forest3-1
description: You think you may be lost but you think you see some type of shelter to the north.

title: forest3-2
description: You walk into an old abandoned barracks, that looks like it has been taken over by nature.

title: forest3-3
description: You think you may be lost but you think you see some type of shelter to the south.

title: forest4-1
description: The surrounding area is very dark and you start to feel frightened.

title: forest4-2
description: The surrounding area is very dark and you start to feel frightened.

title: forest4-3
description: The surrounding area is very dark and you start to feel frightened.

title: forest5-1
description: There is a strangly shaped tree that looks like it may have been used as a stash.

title: forest5-2
description: You feel some strange light shining down on you.

title: forest5-3
description: You walk into a small clearing.

title: forest6-1
description: You feel lured towards the north as if there was some magic there.

title: forest6-2
description: You walk into a wizard tower.

title: forest6-3
description: You walk into a small clearing.
